name: @bitmapland/react-bitmap-utils
description: Utilities for drawing Bitmap Theory related imaging to HTML5 canvas with React

scripts.dev: concurrently -n 'watch ,serve ,reload' -c 'yellow,cyan,green' "npm run serve" "npm run watch" "npm run reload"
scripts.watch: rm -rf build && mkdir -p examples/build && watchify ./examples/src/index.tsx --debug -t [ aliasify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -p [ tsify --project examples/tsconfig.json ] -o examples/build/index.js
scripts.build: rm -rf build && tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json && tsc --project tsconfig.cjs.json
scripts.build-examples: rm -rf examples/build && mkdir -p examples/build && node ./scripts/prep-index-for-pages.js && browserify ./examples/src/index.tsx --debug -t [ aliasify ] -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/preset-env ] ] -p [ tsify --project examples/tsconfig.json ] | terser --compress --mangle --source-map "url='./index.js.map'" --output examples/build/index.js
scripts.test: npm run typecheck && npm run format-check && npm run lint && npm run tests

author: Bitmap Dev
